text: Pashupati Kumar Paras (b 1953) is an Indian politician from the state of Bihar. He is currently serving as a member of Lok Sabha from Hajipur (Lok Sabha constituency). And he was Minister for Animal and Fish Resources Department in the Government of Bihar. He is the younger brother of Ram Vilas Paswan and also the State President of the Bihar unit of Lok Janshakti Party. He has been a member of Bihar Legislative Assembly from Alauli since 1977. He has earlier served thrice as a minister in the state. Having lost the last election in 2015. At the time of his appointment as a Minister in 2017, he was neither a member of Assembly nor Council and was therefore later accommodated as an MLC from the Governor's quota.Won’t agree on less than 7 Lok Sabha seats: ParasMost JDU faces retained in 28-member Nitish Cabinet: BJP gets 11, LJP one == References == Category:People from Hajipur Category:Lok Janshakti Party politicians Category:Janata Party politicians Category:Bharatiya Lok Dal politicians Category:Janata Dal politicians Category:Janata Dal (United) politicians Category:Members of the Bihar Legislative Assembly Category:21st- century Indian politicians Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:17th Lok Sabha members Category:Living people
title: Pashupati Kumar Paras
